actions

Class SequentialScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • actions.Action
      • actions.Scheduler
        • actions.SequentialScheduler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Swimmer

    public class SequentialScheduler
extends Scheduler
    SequentialScheduler is a concrete implementation of Scheduler.

    It executes all the steps in the first action of the list, then removes it to do it again. That's why it is called sequential.

    Author:
    Marine Bal & Alexandre Moevi & Theo Plockyn
